label: Employee Background Investigation Completion Reporting
quote: During the term of this contract, the Contractor is required to provide the names of its employees who successfully complete the CBP T4 or T5 process to the CO and COR.

label: Key Personnel Replacement Proposal Timeline
quote: For key personnel, the Contractor shall propose a qualified replacement employee candidate to the CO and COR within 30 days after being notified of an unsuccessful candidate or vacancy.

label: Non-Key Personnel Replacement Proposal Timeline
quote: For all non-key personnel Contractor Employees, the Contractor shall propose a qualified replacement employee candidate to the COR within 30 days after being notified of an unsuccessful candidate or vacancy.

label: Approval of Replacement Employees by CO/COR
quote: The CO/COR shall approve or disapprove replacement employees.

label: Contract Termination for Failure to Meet Suitability
quote: For contracts requiring Contractor Employees to possess a CBP suitability per SOW/PWS requirements, continuous failure to provide Contractor Employees who meet CBP T4 or T5 requirements may be cause for termination of the contract.

label: Citizenship or LPR Requirement for Classified Access
quote: Contractor Employees who require access to classified information must be U.S. citizens or have Lawful Permanent Resident (LPR) status in accordance with DHS Instruction Handbook 121-01-007-01, Rev. 01, the Department of Homeland Security Personnel Security, Suitability and Fitness Program, Chapter 2, Personnel Security Program Standards, ยง 13, Citizenship Requirements.

label: Citizenship Requirement Waiver Process
quote: A waiver may be granted, as outlined in Chapter 2, ยง 14 of DHS Instruction Handbook 121-01-007-01.

label: Non-Key Personnel Replacement Proposal Timeline
quote: For all non-key personnel Contractor Employees, the Contractor shall propose a qualified replacement employee candidate to the COR within 30 days after being notified of an unsuccessful candidate or vacancy.

label: Approval of Replacement Employees by CO/COR
quote: The CO/COR shall approve or disapprove replacement employees.

label: Contract Termination for Failure to Meet Suitability
quote: For contracts requiring Contractor Employees to possess a CBP suitability per SOW/PWS requirements, continuous failure to provide Contractor Employees who meet CBP T4 or T5 requirements may be cause for termination of the contract.

quote: A waiver may be granted, as outlined in Chapter 2, ยง 14 of DHS Instruction Handbook 121-01-007-01.
